scripts.dev:client: cd client && pnpm dev && cd ../api && pnpm dev
scripts.dev: concurrently  --names 'client,api,engine,store,ws' --prefix '{name}:{pid}' -c 'auto' 'pnpm dev:client' 'pnpm dev:api' 'pnpm dev:engine' 'pnpm dev:store' 'pnpm dev:ws'
scripts.build: cd client && pnpm build && cd ../api && pnpm build
scripts.service:up: docker compose up -d mq db && sleep 20
